text:
Jika ke Jakarta dengan mobil, saya selalu sempatkan transit di salah satu hotel di area Banten. Kali ini jatuh pilihan Swiss Belinn Modern Cikande. 

Selain baru beroperasi tahun 2018, ternyata hotel ini memiliki kenyamanan khas Swiss BelHotel yang biasanya lebih tinggi kelasnya dibanding Swiss Belinn. Alhasil rasanya seperti menginap di Swiss Belhotel walau memang tetap ada bedanya khususnya terkait pelayanan dan makanan.

Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari tol Jakarta-Merak tepatnya di gerbang kawasan industri Modern Cikande sehingga tidak sulit menjangkaunya.

Secara umum hotelnya nyaman, pelayanan ramah, makanan variatif dan enak, serta tempat tidur menggunakan kingkoil sehingga berasa nyamannya.

Sudah mencoba kamar deluxe dan grand deluxe, keduanya sangat nyaman. Dan untuk connecting room ternyata juga tersedia di hotel ini, jadi saat kembali ke Lampung mampir lagi dan coba jenis kamar tersebut yang sama nyamannya walau berada di area industri.
title: Hotel Nyaman di Area Industri

text: Arrived and there was someone opened our door and helped us with our luggage, which helped a lot after a gruesome 20 hours drive from Pekanbaru. Stepping into the lobby you would see the lobby is  vast, well lit, clean and modern.  A good first impression that this hotel is very well maintained. Check-in process was a breeze. Ms. Risda who I believe the lead of the team helped us with everything we had questions for. Trully pleasant. Before entering the room, we were presented with a note saying the room has been disinfected and passed the quality check. Something really important these days. All linens were cleana and fresh. No dust on the chair and tables. Toilet was very clean too. Only downside was that the water pressure was a bit low but the engineering came to fix that for us very soon after we made the inquiry to fix it. Thank you so much for the pleasant stay. We definitely made a good choice to stay here after a long drive before continuing our journey the next day. We wished we have more time to enjoy other amenities of the hotel. Next time. Definitely be back.
title: Worth it
